name: Fumar
description: Fumar is an adorable, pint-sized creature found in volcanic regions. With its unique Heat Ray and Nudge abilities, it spends its days lounging on hot rocks and enjoying the warmth of its natural habitat. It is quick to make friends with nearby Pokémon, and while it can be shy at first, its playfulness and charm won't be denied!
image_prompt: Fumar::0 a chibi young fire-type pokemon, in a volcano environment, blue and red ambient lighting, anime chibi drawing style, pastel background --niji --ar 3:2
